name: Project SHELF-L1,F3
description:
A scientist awakens his lab to find his creations- and something else- are roaming free inside. Can you escape safely? Will you make friends with the creature? Will you burn it all to the ground? 

A survival RPG with puzzle solving and no jumpscares.

Guide: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1w0hnuvqgkYt6EKBCS-6BPE1q8wllpRMmYEK2cKP6Nlw/...

Based on the Plactopod and Sugarpod species! Not at all required for playing, but join our discord if you'd like to chat! https://discord.gg/KKW75RtXFr

MUSIC:

When Arietis, Virgineus, Piscis, Sagittarius, and Geminorium has encircled the sun [10 Echo]

The Way Forward (Brainquake / Linn Frieberg) [PARADIGM]
